Uses of Class
net.sf.javaml.classification.AbstractClassifier

  • Packages that use AbstractClassifier 
    Package Description
    libsvm  
    net.sf.javaml.classification
    Provides several classification algorithms.
    net.sf.javaml.classification.bayes  
    net.sf.javaml.classification.meta
    Provides meta-classifiers like for example the Bagging algorithm.

    • Uses of AbstractClassifier in libsvm

      Subclasses of AbstractClassifier in libsvm 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LibSVM
      Wrapper for the libSVM library by Chih-Chung Chang and Chih-Jen Lin.
      class  SelfOptimizingLinearLibSVM
      A svm variant the optimizes the C-paramater by itself.

    • Uses of AbstractClassifier in net.sf.javaml.classification

      Subclasses of AbstractClassifier in net.sf.javaml.classification 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractMeanClassifier
      Abstract classifier class that is the parent of all classifiers that require the mean of each class as training.
      class  KDtreeKNN
      Implementation of the K nearest neighbor (KNN) classification algorithm with KDtree support.
      class  KNearestNeighbors
      Implementation of the K nearest neighbor (KNN) classification algorithm.
      class  MeanFeatureVotingClassifier
      This classifier calculates the mean for each class.
      class  NearestMeanClassifier
      Nearest mean classifier.
      class  SOM
      Classifier based on the Self-organized map clustering.
      class  ZeroR
      ZeroR classifier implementation.

    • Uses of AbstractClassifier in net.sf.javaml.classification.bayes

      Subclasses of AbstractClassifier in net.sf.javaml.classification.bayes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractBayesianClassifier
      Abstract Bayesian classifier (supervised).
      class  AbstractBayesianClassifier_compact
      Compact Abstract Bayesian classifier (supervised).
      class  KDependentBayesClassifier
      Implementation of the K Dependent Bayes classification algorithm.
      class  NaiveBayesClassifier
      Implementation of the Naive Bayes classification algorithm.

    • Uses of AbstractClassifier in net.sf.javaml.classification.meta

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Bagging
      Bagging meta learner.
      class  SimpleBagging
      Bootstrap aggregating (Bagging) meta learner.
